alert.note: Alert for Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 8:43PM EDT until June 25 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Indiana County in west central Pennsylvania... Southern Jefferson County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 842 PM EDT, the leading edge of a line of severe thunderstorms was located from 7 miles southeast of New Bethlehem to 6 miles northeast of Indiana to 6 miles southeast of Homer City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Indiana, Punxsutawney, Reynoldsville, Clymer, Sykesville, Big Run, Chevy Chase Heights, Rossiter, Ernest, Marion Center, Cherry Tree, Plumville, Glen Campbell, Timblin, Dixonville, Commodore, Lucerne Mines, Worthville, Brush Vly, and Smicksburg. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 89 and 94. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
